Package problem

Class PasswordValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem.Validator<java.lang.String>
      • problem.PasswordValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidator<java.lang.String>
    public class PasswordValidator
extends Validator<java.lang.String>
    Class PasswordValidator determines if the input meets the password requirements.

        Constructor of Class PasswordValidator.

        minLength - - minimum acceptable length, encoded as Integer
        maxLength - - maximum acceptable length, encoded as Integer
        minLowerCase - - minimum number of lowercase letters that the password must contain, encoded as Integer
        minUpperCase - - minimum number of uppercase letters that the password must contain, encoded as Integer
        minDigit - - minimum number of digits that the password must contain, encoded as Integer

        public boolean isValid​(java.lang.String input)
